text:
@GovMurphy I'm glad everybody's going on record with their statements. then we can see how wrong they were in retrospect around Nov 2020.
1. No, we have not lost more people to covid19 than the flu.  we have lost close to 40K people from covid19.  In a single flu season we lose 60K people.
